pr_title: Move GeoJSON Types from Azure Core to Azure Core Experimental

timeline.message: Move GeoJSON types from Azure Core to Azure Core Experimental

timeline.bodyText: There's a com.azure.core.experimental.serializer too. Maybe we should put this in com.azure.core.experimental.spatial.serializer?
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: Placed the serializers in spatial to denote they are tied to the experimental concept of spatial and not serializers.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.message: Remove PointGeometry use from Search APIs, commented out testing using class
